title: Gaurdian of the sands xerath price.?
body:
HEY,

So i went to buy this skin... and i clicked on it from the main page.

See ScreenHunter_31May.0412.42.jpg

And then it brought up this page.

See ScreenHunter_31May.0412.43.jpg

my question is why is it more expensive than advertised?

replies.body: I'd think the discount is no longer up/bugged/expired
